name: 部署医务管理系统
description: 医务管理系统是一种用于医院管理的信息系统，可以帮助医院提高工作效率

steps.name: 解压部署包
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(ls /app/mms/ | grep mms.tar.gz)" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi'

steps.name: 下载JDK17镜像
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(docker images --format "{% raw %}{{.Repository}}-{{.Tag}}{% endraw %}" | grep eclipse-temurin-17-jdk)" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi'

steps.name: 传输JDK17镜像
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(docker images --format "{% raw %}{{.Repository}}-{{.Tag}}{% endraw %}" | grep eclipse-temurin-17-jdk)" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi'

steps.name: 下载Nginx镜像
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(docker images --format "{% raw %}{{.Repository}}{% endraw %}" | grep nginx)" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi'

steps.name: 传输Nginx镜像
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(docker images --format "{% raw %}{{.Repository}}{% endraw %}" | grep nginx)" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi'

steps.name: 加载JDK17和Nginx镜像
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(ls /app/images/ | grep tar)" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi'
steps.command: for image in $(ls /app/images/*.tar); do docker load -i "${image}"; done
